name: Last Hope
description: Your ship explodes and you are left desperately clutching to a tiny planet in an attempt to power your suit until help arrives. Clutch to life in the eerily serene beauty of space with an epic orchestral soundtrack, Last Hope will have your heart racing in all the best ways.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1gb+ Storage: 200 MB available space
